name: European Road Assessment Programme
goal: The European Road Assessment Programme (EuroRAP AISBL)  is an international not-for-profit organisation  registered in Belgium, dedicated to saving lives through safer roads.
euInitiatives:
We have a particular interest in initiatives, policies and legislative files concerned directly and indirectly with the management of road infrastructure safety. We collaborate with our members and stakeholders to promote the built-in safety attributes of road networks and to support and extend the management of safer road infrastructure. Our mission is to strengthen our own efforts and those of others to reduce road deaths and serious injuries.

The potential amendment of Directive 2008/96/EC and support for network-wide road assessments are being followed.
